title: Bioaccumulation and human risk assessment of inorganic nanoparticles in aquaculture species
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00167B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Cristian Suárez-Oubiña, Paloma Herbello-Hermelo, Natalia Mallo, María Vázquez, Santiago Cabaleiro, Raquel Domínguez-González, Antonio Moreda-Piñeiro, Pilar Bermejo-Barrera
The escalating use of inorganic nanoparticles (NPs) in various applications raises concerns regarding their potential environmental release and subsequent bioaccumulation in the food chain, posing a risk to human health....
